resources.string: Select the language used by the user interface and Speech Recognition

Designed for quick self-assessment, %1$s offers an intuitive vision test interface - we have over 5 standardized eyesight, color and reaction tests. The app helps locate nearby eye clinics, provides insightful articles about eye health, and includes useful tools for people with myopia. Whether you want to check your eyesight or learn more about vision care, this app is a practical companion for maintaining eye health.
Click on the screen when it turns green
